basics.name: Cody Robibero
basics.label: Senior Software Engineer
basics.summary: Senior Software Engineer with 8+ years of experience building, modernizing, and operating .NET-based backend, web, and mobile systems. Specialized in large-scale platform migrations, API design, and CI/CD automation with GitHub Actions. Proven track record supporting high-volume, customer-facing SaaS products.

work.name: OwnerRez
work.description: Leader in the vacation rental industry for channel management, CRM, property management, accounting, messaging, and websites
work.summary: Senior engineer building and maintaining high-traffic SaaS features and third-party channel integrations for a vacation rental management platform.
highlights: Implemented customer-facing product features using ASP.NET MVC (Razor Pages) in collaboration with product and design teams
Delivered Booking.com and Vrbo onboarding workflows to support scalable partner integrations
Provided engineering support through technical issue triage and resolution

work.name: RingSquared
work.description: Trusted provider for end-to-end managed voice, analytics, and data solutions
work.summary: Contract senior engineer modernizing high-volume telecom data pipelines and automating Microsoft 365 and Teams provisioning.
highlights: Streamlined ingestion pipelines processing millions of call records with improved reliability and throughput
Automated delivery of customer call records for 30,000+ clients
Built Microsoft 365 and Teams Direct Routing provisioning using Microsoft Graph API and PowerShell
Modernized legacy services by upgrading .NET Framework applications to .NET 8

work.name: Nymbl Science
work.description: A highly engaged digital health program addressing the top anxiety points of aging
work.summary: Full-stack development with a focus on scalable backend APIs and platform modernization.
highlights: Led full modernization of backend systems from .NET Framework to .NET 7, including ASP.NET Core WebAPI and Entity Framework Core
Migrated mobile applications from Xamarin.Forms to .NET MAUI
Designed backend services supporting multiple web and mobile applications
Built internal .NET MAUI tooling for PGP encryption and decryption workflows
Automated ingestion and processing of user eligibility files
Designed and maintained CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions for mobile, API, and frontend deployments across Azure

work.name: Dial800
work.description: Call and text analytics for inbound and outbound communications
work.summary: Designed and implemented client-facing platforms for call analytics, communications, and billing.
highlights: Developed a client portal for call history, routing management, and custom reporting
Built analytics services aggregating call and SMS data into dynamic dashboards
Designed and implemented WebRTC-based voice and video communication systems
Developed APIs for phone number leasing, reservation, and search
Implemented automated billing and invoice generation platforms

work.name: ClassLink Inc
work.summary: Developed OneSync, a web-based service for automated account provisioning into Microsoft Active Directory and Google Directory.

work.name: HVEA Engineers
work.description: Consulting engineers and construction material testing
work.summary: Built an internal web application to manage samples, testing workflows, reports, and scheduling.

projects.name: Jellyfin Media Server
highlights: Core contributor to a large open-source media platform used by hundreds of thousands of users worldwide
Led and maintained a plugin ecosystem with 30+ actively maintained plugins
Designed and reviewed core server functionality and community contributions
